column3: @fivepiece The keys in the repository might soon be replaced with a list of fingerprints, see #11909.
Ah thanks, will have a look
#11909 has been merged! please update this PR to add your key-id to ` contrib/gitian-keys/keys.txt` instead.

utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12354/commits/27736f22d58de56d0ba49d6654d034ccceff47f4, verified that the gitian signature submitted by this author (https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gitian.sigs/pulls?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=is%3Apr+author%3Afivepiece) was signed by the key with the key id D35176BE9264832E4ACA8986BF0792FBE95DC863.
Please sort by name, otherwise this will lead to issues in the future
Done.  (it was not apparent that these are sorted at first)
Should have sorted by int(key id) *ducks*
That would make fingerprint fun just to be on top :)
